website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular set is the ideal choice for customers seeking traditional glow sticks in a jumbo-sized pack.
pros: This 1000-piece pack is the perfect purchase for larger parties and get-togethers, though there are options to buy in smaller  quantities
cons: Have a tendency to leak in hands when being cracked

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best glowsticks that I have purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second summer that we have purchased these glow sticks. They are bright and long lasting. We doubled our order this year because they were so popular last year at our 4th of July celebration. If they are available we will order them again every year.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta have for parties. They're so much fun and buying in bulk is cheaper and easier in the long run. Will probably only buy from Amazon from now on.
customer_reviews.author: josh m.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color for my daughter's wedding
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter's wedding reception, but, of couse my 4 year old had to try some out!! Nice, bright color and seemed to last forever...at least 8 hours of super bright glow but even into the next morning there was still a faint glow to them. Can't wait to use them this weekend at my daughter's wedding!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Chanda D Haskins

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Glowsticks were better than I thought it would be. They were all bright and i didn't have any problems. The kids loved it but the adults even more!! We had about 200 people running around with head bands, glasses, and balls. Definitely would get the connectors for them. I would definitely recommend and will definitely repurchase in the future. Get value for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These used to be great, but now the connectors are useless.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for a while, and they used to come with better connectors that actually stayed on. Now the "connectors" are a single thin tube that's chopped up but still connected by a thin strip, so you have to break off each connector yourself. Also, they barely hold together if at all; the diameter is too large and there isn't enough friction to keep the ends of the glow sticks together. Fail. Let me know when you go back to the old design...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tipton-king

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Lumisticks a year ago and all 100 sticks were good. The kids enjoyed them so I decided to get more this year. I received the glow sticks tube without a lid inside a bubble wrap pack. And out of 11 sticks that I tried only 4 glowed. It’s too much trouble to return so I’ll just hope that the kids won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: M. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Lasted over 24 hours!!
customer_reviews.text: We lost power this weekend for over 24 hours. I just purchased a case of these glow sticks for emergencies and such. I cracked about 10-15 open and spread across the house. No joke. Lit up dimly but we were able to shower and walk around. I kid you not, they were still about 50% glowing still the following night. Made it easy to find and pick up, but these are great glow sticks. A+++ would by again. Actually I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: srslol

customer_reviews.title: Faded after an hour. Quality has gone down hill.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased from this company many times before and the product was fabulous. Glowsticks were bright and lasted many hours before fading. I recently restocked. Glowsticks started fading after an hour, and never really fully glowed to begin with. Super disappointing as I have 3 more tubes of these. Quality has gone downhill. Try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: bad batch
customer_reviews.text: Over many years I have purchased many tubes of glow sticks. But this bulk box of 300 is the worst batch I have ever bought. 1/2 do not glow 1/4 are dim and barely glow. The ones that seem to work are not bright at all or for very long. I bought a different brand from a different seller after these and they out shine and out last these lumisticks. I will not be buying lumisticks again or from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: patrick a roundtree

customer_reviews.title: Name is misleading
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for the kids for camping. Had great reviews and a decent price. The very first one I pulled out to activate didn’t even work. I tried a few more and they only lit halfway. And yes I did shake them. The “ultra right” is false. I bought some at the dollar store that were way more bright. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, bright glow, but 2 out of 3 so far leak?
customer_reviews.text: Planning to give these away on Halloween night, 3 days from now. They arrived today (super fast shipping) and I excitedly opened them to try them out. Cracked a yellow, inserted into the connector to make a bracelet, and BAM it exploded all over my hands. Not great, but figured maybe it was a fluke. Cracked another yellow and the end immediately started leaking as well. Tried a pink, and so far it's not leaking, but this doesn't seem like a good track record so far. Hoping I don't turn my whole neighborhood into a giant glowing mass this Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't be dumb like me :)
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened up the three containers I was upset because I thought there were no blue, green or purple glow sticks. All you have to do is crack them to activate the color and you will see that they are all there. Had I looked at all the photos, I would have seen the one that shows what they look like activated vs. not activated. These are great - just in time for The Fourth of July. It'll be nice to have something fun for the kids since there aren't any fireworks this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressing
customer_reviews.text: I got these 300 and 300 of another brand because I wanted to decrease the chances of having a bad pack and optimize my chances of getting good glow sticks. The two on the RIGHT/TOP are THIS brand. I got an orange and a pink from each, they got snapped within seconds of each other and this is after asking them. SIGNIFICANTLY WORSE glow! I'm not super pleased with these, but especially mixed with the others they'll work. Ultimately, I'm going to try to use the other brand first and leave these as fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Arango

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These are OK, they work, but not very well. We tested about fifty of them and they were all pretty dull. For comparison, here's the Lumistick brand on the left, and a Target ($1 for 15 bracelets) no name brand on the right. The Target bundle was MUCH brighter. For me, this is a case where more for the money isn't worth it. I'd rather have the bright ones. (We shoot them into the sky out of a spud gun in areas where fireworks are prohibited due to fire danger. The kids love it. They love to gather them up when they hit the ground. These dull glow sticks are harder to see and gather.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Word ... "Value"
customer_reviews.text: These glowsticks turned out great. I received them in a thick cardboard tube which was perfect protection for them. The connectors were in a separate bag outside of the cardboard tube. So far I have used them to play glow-in-the-dark Ultimate Frisbee at the beach. For the 40 minutes we played they did not fade in brightness. There are only 2 things I could possible complain about but this is normal for glowsticks. 1.) The connectors were slightly loose and had to be put on perfectly. 2.) It is really easy to "crack" (activate) the glowsticks so you have to be careful while taking them out of the cardboard tube.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.Affordable.Life changing
customer_reviews.text: 400 men,women,and children received your glow Sticks on Sat Nov 9th in an art project that I did at Universal Studios where I install them into yellow rose foam heads and lit up a part of City walk as a Ty to actors who came out to do a free event! TY for your product and affordability!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Status: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So I was getting married and I was trying to think of what would take the shindig to the next level. How about a glow stick rave?!? Yes... very yes This was $60 in the right direction. One of the most hilarious moments of the night was when my 3 year old niece walked by, on the dance floor, with probably about 200 glow sticks around her neck, as she had been collection them for the last half hour. Even the 60 year olds got into these. Friends commented it was the best dance party they had ever been to. Anyways me and strongbad are going to start our own bonafide Pawdy Cloughb now :-D
customer_reviews.author: McCreadyM

customer_reviews.title: The mostly no glow stick.
customer_reviews.text: These were packed well, and came on time, but that's about as good as they got. I got these for a birthday party for my brother in law. Everyone was so excited to use/wear them but then 20 minutes after they weren't glowing anymore. Seriously!? 20 minutes? And that's being generous. I even tried holding them up to a light once they started to lose the glow. Didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: The Yoga Guy

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Green coloration was good & bright. Lasted a good few hours. Worked swell for my St Patrick's day patrying needs. Your mileage may vary with the connectors. I've bought several tubes of glow Sticks from lumistick over the years. All connectors have worked, but a few types will pop open when abused (rustling the wrist in a backpack or sweaty vigorous dancing). No way to tell until you have the tube. But I wouldn't let this deter you, it's a good line of glowsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: More than half don’t illuminate. 2 separate orders.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these twice for a holiday party. The first batch I purchased and only about 5 out of 8 worked. One color or the other would not illuminate. The ones that did looked great. I figured maybe it was a bad lot and ordered 300 more just in case. The first 5 I tested in the new batch had the same issue. Each delivery had a different lot number and the shipping packaging was not damaged so it leads me to believe these are just not that high quality. No time to return for replacement. We’ll just have to make due.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best overall performance
customer_reviews.text: We're using various colors from various suppliers as we're testing a nighttime game. The green from Lumistick has proven the best combination of brightness and longevity. I have a bin full of these which were used last night (12 hours ago). Most of the green ones still have significant glow to them. (Many of the blue from Lumistick are still glowing, but very dimly).
customer_reviews.author: docpkrdude

customer_reviews.title: TO GET MY ORDER CORRECT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS WHAT I ORDERED.........Authentic Lumistick Brand 300 8" Glow Sticks with Connectors (Total 600 Pcs) for Light Up Bracelets and Necklaces | Kid Safe Non-toxic Glowstick Party Pack | Bright Glow – Long Lasting (Assorted, 300) Sold by: EvolutionPlanetDeals Product question? Ask Seller Return eligible through Jan 31, 2019 $17.99
customer_reviews.author: VANESS

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a somewhat disappointed with these glow sticks. We give these away for Halloween every year at a community event and decided to buy in bulk this year to cut down on the cost. Several glow sticks out of each pack didn't even glow and they weren't very bright. Also, the plastic tubing fastener that is provided to turn them into bracelets or necklaces didn't hold very well and they would pop back apart. If we hand these out again we'll probably go back to small packages like we purchased in the past at stores such as Dollar Mart and Dollar Mania!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOOO  Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: What do you do when you have a large group of children for a special evening with fireworks and you give them glow bracelets that don't glow for more than 20 minutes. TERRIBLE PRODUCT!!! Do not buy these!! They're dull at best and that's only for the first few minutes. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to hand out for trick-or-treaters this year, and they worked great. In our bowl of non-candy treats, these were the first things taken by the kids in the neighborhood. They came carefully packaged in a tube, none were broken. They glowed nice and bright, and had connector pieces for each one. Will buy again next Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: MeohMeohMy

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Included all 100 light sticks. DOES NOT come with light stick connectors. So I was not able to create necklaces or bracelets. The light sticks themselves look decent quality and last a while, but again without connectors can't really use this product.
customer_reviews.author: ElleGee

customer_reviews.title: One Word ... "Value"
customer_reviews.text: These glowsticks turned out great. I received them in a thick cardboard tube which was perfect protection for them. The connectors were in a separate bag outside of the cardboard tube. So far I have used them to play glow-in-the-dark Ultimate Frisbee at the beach. For the 40 minutes we played they did not fade in brightness. There are only 2 things I could possible complain about but this is normal for glowsticks. 1.) The connectors were slightly loose and had to be put on perfectly. 2.) It is really easy to "crack" (activate) the glowsticks so you have to be careful while taking them out of the cardboard tube.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the assorted 300pk and they serve their function. Each case was provided with connectors and not a single stick was cracked upon arrival. My ONLY ISSUE is their brightness. Picked several sticks from each case and cracked them at the same time. The sticks started off bright but dimmed down drastically just after a few minutes. Weak brightness is disappointing for me, but if it doesn't bother you, go for it. I'm personally going to stick with my default brand. I lose three colors (purple, white, aqua) and pay an extra buck for the other brand, but it's better than losing long lasting brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Moon

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 of them didn’t light up when tried to crack them & get them ready for trick or treaters on Halloween night. Real let down & pain in the butt, the block we are on has roughly 1200 visitors in 4 hours so things need to move smooth. Having bracelets that don’t glow slows things down.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Adams

customer_reviews.title: Really good glowsticks.  Lasts as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality glow sticks. I broke a few colors open and wore them for 12 hours. The first colors to fade were the blue and purple - at about 12 hours. The next was the orange and red (the red is truly lovely) at about 18 hours. And the greenish-yellow was still going strong after almost 24 hours. The trick or treaters will love these. They usually don't even notice the candy we are giving out. :) These were really good for the kids. They loved them!
customer_reviews.author: lanilindsey

customer_reviews.title: Too Many Non-working Glow Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, I have purchased lots of glow sticks for my students. This is the first time I have been this disappointed with a glow stick purchase. I ordered 10 packs of 100 each. Out of each package, 25-50% of the sticks would not activate. The ones that did activate were very dim. I bought these as a reward for my elementary music classe students to have a disco glow light party. They were very sad to have to break so many glow sticks before one would light up. I would not buy from this company again. It was a very big waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Good fun for about an hour
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 3year olds birthday party. Thankfully these were purchased in good fun for the party, and not for any other reason because the brightness was poor and these glow sticks only glowed for about an hour. I had better luck with the ones I purchased from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: About 30% of these were duds. They didn’t light up at all. Another 10% didn’t stay lit for more than 5 minutes. So, out of 100, I only had about 60 that were useful. The color was inconsistent. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa D.

customer_reviews.title: If you're thinking about ordering them do not waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews stating that these glowsticks don't work, and ordered them anyway because there aren't any other all red options, and crossed my fingers hoping they would work. Well, I received them today, AND THEY STRAIGHT UP DO NOT WORK!!! By that I mean nothing happens when you crack and shake them. If you're thinking about ordering them do not waste your time, you will be immediately returning them. I also ordered their all pink and all white packages, and I'm returning them as well. They give off an extremely dim light compared to other glowsticks I've purchased, but at least they worked, unlike the red ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this was easily the best money I spent on my entire wedding
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, this was easily the best money I spent on my entire wedding. Got them for the dance floor during the reception because I thought it would make for cute pictures. Special bonus was that I had an excuse to have a sign that said "let love glow." Anyway, the kids loved them, kept them super entertained. The adults had fun too, don't get me wrong, but to this day my 5 year old niece still talks about the glow sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect entire package to work.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a large group of Girl Scouts & family to use while we did some holiday caroling one evening. There were quite a few sticks in the package that didn’t work, but the ones that did looked/worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised, even after several attempts to bend along the entire length of the bracelet to break the inner tube. Shaking vigorously to illuminate only to see more green than a balance between green/purple. Lot #8906 ION29-18-V must be old!
customer_reviews.author: jeverton

customer_reviews.title: Glows bright, No Duds.
customer_reviews.text: These glowed bright, and still had some glow in them the next morning. Color: To be technical I would describe these as very light frosty blue. But I supposed if you called them anything blue, people would complain they were white. I used these at a kids halloween event. I had about 20 that I didn't use, but out of the 80 that I prepped each lit up just fine. I had no duds or leaks with any of the ones I got. A+++
customer_reviews.author: cet

customer_reviews.title: A glowing review
customer_reviews.text: Halloween can be such a transactional time. Kid shows up. Adults hands over candy. Kid leaves and overeats candy. Not ideal. This year we added glow sticks to the mix and they were a huge hit. Little kids saw the glow sticks decorating our Halloween table and ask for their own. [The container comes with plastic connectors allowing you to chain as many of the flexible glow sticks as you want.] The discussion over the light stick bracelets was entertaining and when they get the glow sticks, the kids faces literally light up. ☺ We also like to ask the kids to tell us a joke for the reward of an extra glow stick. Good times.
customer_reviews.author: Playonwards

customer_reviews.title: Blue: It’s a Boy!!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for our gender reveal! Everyone got a “vote” by holding up the color of their choice. With the lights dimmed it made for a special time and everyone could participate. Blue
customer_reviews.author: Vickie in GA

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Glow
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money!!! I'm now stuck with hundreds of glow sticks that don't work! I wish you could return the rest after opening one tube and discovering they're so old they no longer glow!!! I even went with this seller over a cheaper one because the reviews were better! Uh, bad idea! The event is over, and you can't redo the past! Big let down on this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Red Head

customer_reviews.title: Rage On!
customer_reviews.text: You really can't go wrong with glow sticks. I've ordered several of these giant packs over the year. It's a great value, I've never had issues with the quality of the glow sticks either. The connectors come in a nice little separate bag as well so they don't go everywhere when that drunk friend rips open the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: A Girl And Her Dog

customer_reviews.title: It truly is Aqua color
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my cousin's quinceanera something like a sweet 16. I thought it'd be perfect for when the lights go off and the line dancing begins. Her theme color is Aqua so I purchased the aqua color. My phone does not justice for the true color, but it really is an aqua color. It came with the plastic to use it as a bracelet. I searched online for better prices and thus was the best deal I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L

customer_reviews.title: Defective, bad quality, dim
customer_reviews.text: Some of these leaked and one stained and ruined my wood table, not even being worn at the time. I bought them early to have for 4th of July, but had to return for refund. Now we have none. Even if they were usable, which they are not, they are very dim.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: These are lumi stick glow, but they were extreenly poorly packed, and seem to not be fresh.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy from the original manufacturer here on amazon, you 'll get better packaging so fewer glowsticks are pre cracked (dead) and are guaranteed t be made this year (glow brighter and longer). I got these from a 3rd party on accident and was dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters wedding and she and all of the guests loved them! The color was more of a blue-ish than aqua or teal but they still looked pretty good. 99 out of 100 worked so that was good. The connecters were definitely much better quality and performed better than the glow sticks that I bought at the Dollar Store. I would definitely buy these glow sticks again!
customer_reviews.author: David Caiani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Halloween treat!
customer_reviews.text: The glowsticks arrived ahead of schedule and were an awesome non-candy treat for Halloween! They are packed neatly and compactly in three protective tubes that can be re-used to store for later use. They glowed away once snapped and the connectors worked as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Keri P

customer_reviews.title: No glow
customer_reviews.text: Most of the sticks (80%) did not glow at all or were very dim (useless). I purchase these frequently (usually 1000 at a time) so I have a lot of experience with glowsticks, so believe me when I say these were bad. I've had good luck with this brand in the past, so that leads me to believe that either this batch was old (sticks lose effectiveness with age), or they were subjected to shock in shipping which caused them to set off early (don't you hate it when that happens!). Either way, most did not glow and were useless.
customer_reviews.author: jer

customer_reviews.title: Work Well, more blue than white
customer_reviews.text: A few broke as they were being snapped. Which they shouldn't have been because you have to bend them to make bracelets. The color isn't white like the pics but more of a blue. Other than that they're fine. *came with 100 glow sticks (I did not count to make sure I have 100. *none looked to be snapped before I opened it. *came with 100 connected. Well I hope there's 100.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Best quality brightest glow stick 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand of glow sticks I've ever had and all I use I buy multiple packs every year for a music festival and I always make that always have at least 10 to 15 people come up to me a night and asked me where I buy them because they're so bright and Vivid in comparison to everyone else's.
customer_reviews.author: SoopaJooce

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for an event we had. I gave them to one of my great nieces to hand out around the bond fire and everyone loved them. My niece couldn't find the connectors in the tube, so I dug them out and the kids had a blast making all kinds of fun things with them. They were a bigger hit than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Julie White

customer_reviews.title: Crank Up The Party!
customer_reviews.text: The glow sticks I received were not Lumistick brand but some off-brand name from who knows where. Normally I would be very upset but I didn't notice too much of a difference between what I received and what I was expecting, they're just glow sticks. They did get noticeably more dull as the night wore on but that is typical for most glow sticks. For the price I would totally purchase another set of these to amp it up at a party. They went over huge and I'd like to buy a few hundred more next time for a truly catastrophic glow stick bash!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. Barely any of the sticks actually glowed, maybe 1 out of every 6, and even then they were not very bright. Took a tube of them camping and was excited to have some glow fun once the sun went down. Only time they flowed bright was when I chucked them in the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Halloween. Seem pretty good, but put some in my sweatshirt during a party to hand out and they snapped. Think it was my fault, but then when I tried to snap them the rest of the way a few days later they didn't work. I had to throw those 3 away, but other than those, so far the rest have been great with no complaints. Great price for how many I've received. Fun to hand out whenever the kids are outside and for parties.
customer_reviews.author: ktmb

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a safety oriented toy.
customer_reviews.text: I give these out every Halloween. These come with the connectors to make the sticks into bracelets. The sticks come up to a pretty bright glow quickly. Good value for the price. I'll be buying another box next year.
customer_reviews.author: Particularly Purple

customer_reviews.title: DUDS!
customer_reviews.text: The Orange and Blue glowsitcks I recieved were complete DUDS/DEFECTIVE. Only lasted for maybe 5 minutes. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: The Ontiveros Group

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I bought them often. This last pack had 4 that popped open on the kids and caused me to have to clean them up again at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great set, very few duds
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these to give out to children at our church's Trunk or Treat on Halloween and they were a HUGE hit! Out of the 300, I believe we only had about 5 duds, which isn't too bad at all. The only negative is these don't glow very long. Within 30 minutes, they lose their luster, and by 2 hours they're nearly completely out, but they are great otherwise. The kids loved them, and we'll order again for Vacation Bible School next summer!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Took these camping to see the kids. They lined our campsite with them so they could see the boundary. They were pretty bright. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: FlamingoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: We always buy a pack or two of these for any upcoming festivals and camping. Never had any problems with them being precracked or anything. Some of them tend to be a little dull or may not last as long as others, but not enough to be an issue or care too much about. They also come with the single tube connectors for necklaces and bracelets, but you can get creative with them.
customer_reviews.author: Schnar

customer_reviews.title: If you have kids that love shaking glow sticks
customer_reviews.text: If you have kids that love shaking glow sticks, the colors will mix, there is no divider between the 2 colors. The kids still loved them and I would order them again. If you are putting them in give away bags, they are easier to break then a larger glow stick, so I had to swap kids with unbroken ones several times.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten C.

customer_reviews.title: CRAPTASTIC Quality
customer_reviews.text: Yes you get a ton of glow sticks but the glow quality stinks! I had some left over glow sticks from another brand and these glowed at like 25% of the intensity. I'd much rather pay the $1-$2 more for another brand to get a better glow.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble. We ended up not using these for a party due to the difficulty of trying to snap them together
customer_reviews.author: minired65

customer_reviews.title: Glow doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. We gave them out at a Halloween event, and the kids liked them. But it was a pain to have to manually put the connectors on each stick ... too bad they weren't already attached. And the glow seemed to fade to 50% within just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rajeev goel

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special.  Does the job. But wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than I thought. I also thought it was a pack of half purple sticks and half green sticks. But both colors are on every stick. Also, some were broken/wouldn't light up. So if you need an exact amount maybe order extras just in case. They don't glow very long. Maybe 4 hours max. But it was for a toddler party, so it turned out okay! ☺️
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Very blue. Very glowing. No eldritch possession by ...
customer_reviews.text: Very blue. Very glowing. No eldritch possession by unimaginable evils from beyond space and time required.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Willson

customer_reviews.title: Um... No!!!
customer_reviews.text: About 25% of these did not work. Another 25% lasted for about 20 minutes. The other 50% were decent, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Perry D'Avlo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this particular brand for the last couple of years. I bought this pack to give out at our annual 4th of July party to all the little ones and to keep track of the guests and teens swimming in the lake after dark. As always anything glow in the dark is a big hit. I had no problems with shipment or issues with glow intensity. This is the first shipment I've ever received, however, where we had leaking issues with a few bracelets. Of course, some of the adults thought it would be great fun to then make splatter glow in the dark t-shirts. Overall, a good value.
customer_reviews.author: MsTHS

customer_reviews.title: Purple Glow Sticks - What's NOT to love?!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old is obsessed with all things PURPLE. She was delighted with this tube of 100 glow sticks. Now we do not have to "force" her to use other colors once we used up all the purples - problem solved! Great quality & great value.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Amz

customer_reviews.title: Halloween
customer_reviews.text: These were great. A perfect alternative to candy on Halloween. I just wish that they stayed bright a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2bnva

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these orange & blue glowstick bracelets for my 20 year reunion since these were my school colors. We had a cocktail party at an 80s Club so these were perfect! The only reason I did not give 5 stars was because there were a few duds in the package so you truly don't get 100 working sticks but closer to 90.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Two of them make a pretty tight choker
customer_reviews.text: Shorter than other brands and not nearly as bright. Two of them make a pretty tight choker. Works fine in a dark room, not very impressive on a dance floor with dance lights. Not as impressive as ones I've bought in small packages at the grocery store. Probably would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zephrant

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality glowsticks. I got them to hand out at Halloween in addition to candy. I broke one when I got it cause I was curious how they would do. It was super bright and my husband stole it from me and started brandishing his mini lightsaber. So I broke another one and began dueling him. They stayed illuminated for nearly a full day. I will be buying again next Halloween if the kids like them :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: more like a pinkish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 tubed of 100 and every single bracelet glowed bright. My company passed these out during a nighttime festival and they were a huge hit. Side note, these do not glow a true red, more like a pinkish, orangey red.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: great product !
customer_reviews.text: We taped the connected sticks to our bodies like skeletons, it was amazing looking. We expected the glow sticks to quit working within 8-12 hours, but it took 2 1/2 days to stop glowing we were very impressed. I will buy more of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use for a youth activity. They arrived quickly and were very easy to snap together to use. I would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a "purple" team
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hand out to kids who were on my team at a horse show, the "purple" team. They were a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for so many bracelets
customer_reviews.text: Some of the bracelets didn't fully light that's why 4 star . But it does happen with an brand from time to time. Out of 100 maybe 15-20 had the bubbles in them that didn't fully shake up. But rest of it did so still glowed. But the price was great as I needed so many of them. Pretty color too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great light sticks
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a comminty Halloween event. They light up great, but cracking them all is rough on your hands. Light up bright and last. A day after, it still glowed bright, not frozen. Two days later, it was dim. Just let it sit on the counter. Kids loved them. Caution that it is easy to lose the plastic joiners.
customer_reviews.author: Jorder

customer_reviews.title: Combine to Make Necklaces - Cheaper than Oriental Trading!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 300 pack of glow bracelets for our high school group to use as a fundraiser (selling at football games). It came out to about .06 cents per piece. What several of the kids were then doing was combining 3 of them to make a glow necklace (there are little clear plastic connectors that come with them so you can do that). The combined price of .18 cents far beats the price you get glow necklaces for at Oriental Trading ($1.00 each). And you can't really tell the difference between using 3 glow bracelets and 1 necklace. Would recommend these for kids birthday parties, fundraiser, church parties, etc.
customer_reviews.author: kiwanissandy

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can give this 0. Do not purchase. I repeat. DO NOT PURCHASE. It's not fresh glow sticks...I purchased 2000 and it only glowed for 2 hours. Its expired. The shelf life has ended and they are just trying to sell it out. I live in Trinidad and it cost me alot to ship, I purchased it for Autism Awareness Month to give to lids but was not able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave away these glow bracelets for Halloween and they were a big hit. I appreciated the large containers. They were easy to use and only 1 dud in 900 (much better than any I purchased in the past).
customer_reviews.author: Teri Bergin

customer_reviews.title: Make it glow! Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: These glow for a very, very long time. This was an excellent buy. We are just a family, but we go through a lot of "glow parties" - throwing them around the yard at night, hanging big loops of them in trees, making creepy things, etc. They tend to break pretty easy, so try to keep them in the container or you'll find you've lost some of them to time, or you'll get glowing goo everywhere. (Okay, well, painting with goo and making your arms glow is sorta fun, but probably not the best idea.)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Looks like they will work fine for my intended use. Bright enough, long enough, and thick enough. I plan to use them as bite indicators on my fishing rods for night fishing. They appear as if they will do the job, but of course won't know for sure until fishing season returns net spring. Will comment further after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dreino

customer_reviews.title: The price point was good, and the kids loved them
customer_reviews.text: We passed these out at Halloween. The price point was good, and the kids loved them. I still have a lot left. The pink color was a problem though; the connector to turn it into a bracket just wouldn't stay on the pink ones. The yellow color was perfect-with the other colors in between. We also got extra connectors, which was nice since kids lose them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Frazine Jr.

customer_reviews.title: They come as a straight glow stick, and I ...
customer_reviews.text: They come as a straight glow stick, and I didn't realize I wouldn't get the couplings to convert them into a circle. Still managed to use them for what we intended, and they lasted about 3 hours which was plenty for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Halloween!
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up to pass out at Halloween instead of candy. Kids get candy at every house, so I thought it would be fun to give them something a little different that would help them stay visible in the dark. The little connectors that turn the glow sticks into bracelets are packaged separate from the sticks in a bag, so they need to be added to each unit manually. I did have one glow stick burst from bending it too far, but overall I was impressed with the length and strength of the glows.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcakin

customer_reviews.title: They are sticks
customer_reviews.text: They are sticks that last maybe 3 hours only. They do not come as a bracelet and I am trying to figure out how to make them a bracelet. Cute for a one time event like a night kids party, but i probably wont purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Not what I order I order bracelets and got glow sticks and it only had 15 in them that’s why I wanted the bracelets it was a set off 100 and I need it them for today for a party so I had to use what I got this sucks cause not everyone got one since it was way less then what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: A lot of them broke
customer_reviews.text: Was not super impressed with these. During the night, a lot of them broke and there was glowing green liquid on the white table cloths that will not come out! Will probably splurge for something a little more reliable next time.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Expire pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: Normally glow sticks last a super long time. These stopped working about a year after we bought them. If you order them I advise you use them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Turk

customer_reviews.title: ... with purple being the least bright - so not super great glow quality - possibly a little old
customer_reviews.text: the green and yellow were the brightest with purple being the least bright - so not super great glow quality - possibly a little old? Purchased for 8 year old birthday party - specifically black light bowling and for this purpose it is fantastic for quantity and value.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper's mom

customer_reviews.title: They filled the need
customer_reviews.text: These were white which was hard to find. They start off bright but dim down pretty quick. They did stay glowing till the dance was done but not as bright as I'd hope they would stay.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen m robb

customer_reviews.title: A Brighter Halloween
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to give out at Halloween. Out of the 300 bracelets, only one did not glow. The kids loved them (we gave candy also just in case), and hopefully it helped to keep them safe. We only gave them to the kids (no adults) and only one per child. We ran out about 2/3 the way through the evening. Next year I will buy more than 300. They are thin and not quite long enough to slip over the hands of some teenagers, so you have to actually assemble the bracelets on the wrist. But they were bright, and the kids thought they were great.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and colorful
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the value on these glowsticks! Unlike many of the cheap brands, these start bright and many stay bright for a good 5-8 hours before they dim (though some of the colors, especially reds begin to dim sooner after perhaps an hour). Also, there are a few colors in this pack, such as sky blue, which aren't in the normal range of glowstick colors and are really pretty. They come with bracelet/necklace adapters which don't really fit into the tube until a few sticks are removed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: We used these as a sort of joke during a wedding reception outdoors, the women loved them and probably the guys too. The lumens are only strong within the first hour, then gradually diminish in strength. It was fun and the kids went crazy for them.
customer_reviews.author: JayisMad

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these..bought as wedding favors...snap easily n prematurely if not careful so some got wasted but overall great quality, my color in bulk, great buy
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Lette

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I agree that these are not the brightest glow sticks on the market, but I will continue to buy them since they are an unbelievable value! There's a huge variety of colors, which makes it fun for the kids. 8" is a perfect size for bracelet, and 2 or 3 for a necklace. I have only found one or two that didnt glow. At this price, we open up a tube when we have friends with kids over, and let them have at it! they like to play TRON tag outside at night. For this price, you don't have to be stingy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: I gave these away on Halloween. Trick or treaters were very grateful. I tried giving the remaining sticks away on Times Square in New York when we visited but people ran away.
customer_reviews.author: charliesixpack

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: These glowsticks are possible the best purchase I made for my wedding. They were SUCH a big hit, everyone was decked out and dancing with them on! They came in 3 tubes of 100 each, and 2 of the tubes were used for about a 150 person wedding. The connectors worked just fine, and the colors glowed really well. I was so surprised that such a relatively inexpensive thing would make the night that much more fun! And now I have 100 left over for future parties!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Hutchison

product_meta.title: Lumistick 8 Inch 1000 Glow Sticks Bulk Party Favors with Connectors | Light Sticks Neon Party Glow Necklaces and Glow Bracelets | Glow in The Dark Party Supplies (Assorted, 1000 Glow Sticks)
feature_bullets: ? 1000 PACK OF 8 INCH ASSORTED GLOW STICKS: You will receive 8-inch glow sticks 1000 Piece, all carefully packed into our iconic Lumistick cardboard tube. Get the most out of these sticks for decoration and fun. Hang them from things to create fun luminaries and enchanting walkways, you can enjoy the vibrant display of colored light trails. Make sure you get the best glow sticks by using this brand.

? LONG LASTING LIGHT: Enjoy the glow radiating from your wrist glowsticks for up to 12 hours. After activation, these cool glow sticks will be at their brightest for 8-10 hours, then slowly fade. Choose from our array of colors and color combinations or get the assorted pack.

? WATERPROOF, SAFE AND NON TOXIC: Our powerful glow sticks contain two chemicals that glow when mixed together (when the stick is bent and the inner tube is broken). Use these glow in the dark party favors even in the pool, these waterproof glow sticks party supplies are non leaking. Our sticks are non-toxic, non-flammable non-radioactive, and can be easily washed off the skin or clothes with ordinary soap if necessary.

? KIDS SAFE & QUALITY ASSURED: The Kids are safe, glow in the dark party sticks are CPSIA-compliant. Make glow stick bracelets and glow in the dark necklaces for pool parties, birthdays, carnivals, raves, concerts, weddings, camping, and more.

? UP TO 2 YEARS OF SHELF LIFE: These light glowsticks were manufactured just a few weeks ago and are fresh from the factory. The glowstick party pack comes in a handy tube that can also be used as a storage container for the unused Lumistick glow sticks. They have a shelf life of two years.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,086 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
